Odometer

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Odometer.Odometer

  • public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will calculate the robot’s X and Y coordinates and angle from its location relative to the starting point. The odometer is initalized to 90 degrees, assuming the robot is facing up the positive y-axis
    Author:
    Sean Lawlor ECSE 211 - Design Principles and Methods, Head TA Fall 2011 Ported to EV3 by: Francois Ouellet Delorme Fall 2015
